question: Which fitness campaign of India has recently been applauded by World Health Organization?
option1: Fitness ka Dose Aadha Ghanta Roz
answer: Fitness ka Dose Aadha Ghanta Roz
explanation: The World Health Organization has praised India for its fitness campaign,"Fitness ka Dose Aadha Ghanta Roz". This programme has been launched with the initiative to promote physical activity. It was launchedÂ  by Union Minister of Youth Affairs and Sports Kiren Rijiju.
